Description: The French Riviera has many beautiful spots and places to visit. Antibes should definitely be on your list if you are interested in the pre-historic times of the Romans and the English. After you get to know your guide you will start to visit the beautiful sites of the town. Discover the charm of the small village, have a coffee in a local caf√©, and visit the markets to get to know the french cuisine and the unique, regional specialties.
